page.title: 04Housing
page.content: In Compton we have old houses and new houses,some of the oldest houses dating back to King Henry the Eigth. Many of the newer houses were built only about two or three years ago. There are council houses,privately owned houses and some are owned by the bigger farms and the Agricutural Food Research Centre. Most people live in in two storey houses,though there are also a number of bungalows,cottages and flats. No people from our school live in flats or terraced houses.Majority of people live in semi-detached while a few live in detached houses.
